answers.author: John Zakian
answers.text:
The city of West Palm Beach has a Community Events Office and Community Events Manager.  During my tenure as Assistant City Administrator for West Palm Beach this was one of the units that reported to me.  It has a very robust year round program of events many of which are sponsored including a weekly concert series in the downtown as well as a seasonal Farmers' Market.  It has both policies and marketing strategy governing sponsorships and has been very successful for well over a decade.  Mary Pinak is the Community Events Manager for the city.

answers.author: Hannah Wolford
answers.text:
The ICMA Center for Performance Measurement has found that many of our participants are revisiting their policies surrounding special events.  Most recently a question was posted to the Knowledge Network regarding charity 5ks (http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/22390/Special_Events_Management_and_Permits?utm_source=knemail).  Although the question is not exactly the same, I think a number of the resources provided in the responses will be helpful to you in your search for best practices.

author: Alexis Hill
text:
Hello all, the City of Reno has implemented a new Special Events Sponsorship Policy and Application process.  Through implementation we have found that modifications need to be made to our program.  I would love to learn about other Cities sponsorship programs so I can ensure that I am implementing best practices.
Thank you for your time,
Alexis Hill
